title: Worlds 2018 group stage prediction

embed.description: League of Legends Wiki, LoL Wiki, lol wiki, lolwiki, The home for League of Legends esports statistics, schedules, player biographies, team histories, live coverage, and more.

body:
With now group stage finally locked in
A: AFS-G2-PVB-FW
B: GENG-C9-VIT-RNG
C: KT-MAD-TL-EDG
D: FNC-100T-IG-GREX
I want to see your predictions guys (just for fun)
my predictions are
group A : AFS-G2 Advance to knockout
group B : RNG-GENG Advance to knockout
Group C : KT-EDG Advance to knockout
Group D : FNC-IG Advance to knockout

I know some people is gonna blame me for this why am i stupid why predict G2 Over FW ? and Some of this stuff this is just my opinion
let me know what are your thoughts :D

replies.body: I honestly don't know who to vote. I know I'm rooting for 100T, but I don't really know any of the non-NA teams. I only started playing in March and I'm only really rooting for 100T because of Aphromoo and C9 because of Sneaky. If I could get some advice on the match ups that'd be pretty cool. Maybe I'll just go with your picks because I don't really know any better. (Except I'll sub out one for 100T because like I said I like Aphromoo. Lol)

Group A:  1st AFS......2nd FW
Group B:  1st RNG.....2nd Gen.G
Group C:  1st TL........2nd KT
Group D:  1st IG........2nd 100T

> [{quoted}](name=Adrenilyn,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=P7agiEV6,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-09T03:28:13.049+0000)
>
> Group A:  1st AFS......2nd FW
> Group B:  1st RNG.....2nd Gen.G
> Group C:  1st TL........2nd KT
> Group D:  1st IG........2nd 100T

Team Liquid first hahahahha. What a joke. There's a zero percent change TL will win their group.

{{champion:17}}

> [{quoted}](name=Adaptable,realm=OCE,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=P7agiEV6,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-10-09T07:31:01.194+0000)
>
> Team Liquid first hahahahha. What a joke. There's a zero percent change TL will win their group.
> 
> {{champion:17}}

I'd put money on it. TL and KT both go 4-2 with TL winning the tie breaker. TL, KT and EDG split there games. TL and KT sweep MAD, but EDG splits with them. 

TL goes 5-2 *wins tie breaker*
KT goes 4-3
EDG goes 3-3
MAD goes 1-5

KT is a monster team, but I really think TL have 1st locked up. Laugh all you want. We will see come the butt crack of dawn. 4am Eastern is the start of groups for me.  Lets go

TL 0-2 so far ;D
I hope you didn't put your money on that.
This is the only year that I honestly and definitely can't see which team will make it out of groups....... every team this year/group looks close and exciting.

I couldn't agree more. In my eyes, there is no definitive cut above all team that has no exploitable weakness in their play. I used to consider two potential exceptions to that in the form of Flash Wolves and Invictus Gaming but I can rule out IG due to their post Rift Rivals summer falters and FW has become so domestically sound that their international results are usually the best basis. I'm probably gonna just wing my pick'em; go total underdog.

So True!  Previous years it's been the same ol' results but I think the unexpected will happen.  Teams, regions, story lines will all 'buck the trend'......... at least in the group stage at the moment this year.

FW aren't that strong, then again, G2 honestly isn't good too.
Vitality is probably gonna get raped but I think FNC is gonna play a good tournament.
u got strong point and I agree neither of FW or G2 are strong but in terms of best of 1 games I think G2 Would have the advantage

> [{quoted}](name=WindrippÃ¨rino,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=P7agiEV6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-10-07T15:32:58.428+0000)
>
> u got strong point and I agree neither of FW or G2 are strong but in terms of best of 1 games I think G2 Would have the advantage

G2 has traditionally been trash in Bo1 setups. If you think that was due to Zven and Mithy, then there's more hope this year, but... eh. I think Fanatic's the only western team getting out of groups.

100t making out of groups is as low a probability as me winning mega millions. Here are my predictions:
    1        2          3      4
A: AFS   G2       FW   PVB
B: RNG  GENG  C9    VIT
C: KT     TL        EDG  MAD
D: FNC  IG        100T GREX
But so far it seems AFS is not going to make it and FW are really showing up.

> group A : AFS-FW Advance to knockout
> group B : RNG-GENG Advance to knockout
> Group C : KT-TL Advance to knockout
> Group D : FNC-IG Advance to knockout

Minor changes. FW > G2 and TL > EDG

Those are my picks, but I could see those matchups going either way.
I think Liquid could beat EDG and make it out of groups.

> [{quoted}](name=NukeDuck2,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=P7agiEV6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-07T16:19:28.515+0000)
>
> I think Liquid could beat EDG and make it out of groups.

I will even go one step further and say TL will have a break out group stage and take 1st in groups with KT in 2nd after a tie breaker to see who gets 1st seed. 

The resurgence of a Season 3 "TOP DIE" looking Impact, the synergy between xMithie and Pobelter has been on point over summer and against 100 thieves and Cloud9 in playoffs. Pobelter is finally playing like a Top Tier Mid laner.  Doublelift having the best Season he has ever had with imo his best support to hit the Rift with. Yeh there was Aphromoo that is one of the best supports in the game, but Olleh is better suited for Doublelift.  This team is the best team to ever play on the worlds stage out of North America. Finally, we all know xMithie will show up and perform. He is always consistent regardless, but looked so good during Finals. Everyone is stepping up.

This group is going to be fun to watch. Can't wait for Day 1. So anxious!

i think the only grp that we can predicts the winners is group b . because c9 and TV have no chance to win gen.g or RNG . in group a i prefer afs and g2 .. group c kt and maybe edg or tl , group d fnc gona win it with ig or Grex
